data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Hao-Yu, Mao, Shao-Li, Shi, Fu-Ming (2014): Review of the genus Pentacentrus Saussure (Orthoptera: Gryllidae: Pentacentrinae) from China. Zootaxa 3838 (5): 557-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3838.5.4
